title: Supply and Delivery of Materials for Sustainable Power Sector Support  Project (Expansion of Rural Electrification & Distribution System Improvement Ampara & Uva) Package 4 - Lot No. 6C - Copper Cables & Earthing Material  Lot No. 6D - Testing Instruments
decision_details: -  the proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, Minister of Power and Energy, to award the contracts for lots 6C and 6D of Package 4, for a sum of Rs.18,567,094.32 and Rs.39,473,349.60 respectively, was approved by the Cabinet.
